mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member(userid, passwd, name, phone, email, zipcode, addr1, addr2) VALUES(#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_member WHERE userid = #{userid} AND passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET passwd = #{passwd} WHERE userid = #{userid}
